sentence: Calling Governor Ron DeSantis' plan to dissolve Disney's self-governance district "harebrained," a trio of Democratic Florida lawmakers spoke out against the move Monday, saying it could lead to higher taxes for the counties where Walt Disney World is located.
author: Thomas Kika
title: Dissolving Disney Government Creates 'Dire' Situation: Florida Lawmakers

author: Skyler Swisher
title: Lawmakers suspect DeSantis wants to take control of Disney Worlds government

author: Don Jacobson
title: DeSantis hints state of Fla. will take control of dissolved Disney district
